name: The Royal Hunting Lodge
description:
DESCRIPTION
A warm welcome awaits you in this former royal château which is majestic yet cosy, rustic yet refined, friendly yet discreet. This historic French monument is situated in the countryside, just 15 minutes from a busy spa town, and has stunning views across the Allier Valley that can be enjoyed from the large terrace and pool area.
The Château provides a fantastic backdrop for an exclusive dream wedding. A classic fairytale castle with towers surrounded by lush gardens and nestled in its own 22 hectare private estate, this venue is a stunning and beautiful location for your special wedding.
Located in the centre of France, surrounded by the natural beauty of the unspoilt Auvergne Region, the château is ideally situated to bring together guests travelling from across France, Europe and even further afield. Over the last 25 years the château has been privileged to host parties for guests of more than 70 different nationalities.
An unforgettable party without having to worry about getting back home, you are home! Choosing the château for one or more days includes beds for 54 guests in the castle (without counting the fold up beds for children). This on site sleeping capacity can be further increased by renting the holiday home and/or yurts which are just a small walk from the chateau.
The magnificent oak panelled "Grande Salle" and its custom made marquee extension benefit from exceptional views over the valley and provide a fabulous setting for a reception dinner. For larger parties, the Grande Salle and the marquee together provide a seating capacity of up to 130 people and for smaller parties the Grande Salle alone can seat up to 80 people. Cocktails on the large paved terrace are unbeatable ! A further three smaller reception rooms can be used to provide an area dedicated to children : babysitters, children's meals, various activities and why not a little kids disco !
The purpose built pergola in the park is the perfect setting for a unique wedding or vow renewal ceremony. Set in a sheltered and quiet location overlooking the lakes, it is an original structure and pretty backdrop for an intimate and highly personalised ceremony.
We can help you organise your special day to make it one that neither you nor your guests will ever forget. We can provide assistance with all aspects of planning your event or alternatively we can recommend a local English speaking wedding planner.
In a nutshell:
16 en-suite bedrooms, 2 family suites, 1 ground floor suite - disabled access, 2 apartments
Château sleeps 54 guests
Plus 10 fold out beds and 5 cots available
Holiday home, B&B and yurts in immediate vicinity
1 Large Reception Room "Grande Salle"
Marquee extension of the Reception Room
3 Additional meeting/dining rooms
Bar
Indoor heated swimming pool
Sauna
Outdoor swimming pool
Pergola (77m²)
Helipad
Terrace 250m²
Private park 22 hectares
Parking on site for 80 cars
Two night minimum booking required.
If you would like more information then please do get in touch, we will be more than happy to help.
